about_the_game:
This is the story of a video game writer whose life falls apart with the rise of neural networks.

Accept it? Fight back? Or take on the challenge and create THE MOST HUMAN GAME IN THE WORLD?

Let your choices provide the answer...

  • Explore the different endings of this short drama.

  • Everything is handcrafted and made with heart. How often do you see something like this nowadays?

  • Straightforward gameplay without convoluted puzzles lets you fully immerse yourself in the story.

name: Neural Edge Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a short, narrative-driven story about a video game writer who was replaced by neural networks and refuses to go down without a fight.
